name: Ed's Portfolio
description:
Welcome to my personal interactive portfolio!

Walk around the room to find the arcade machines, which contain information about my projects. You'll need 3 coins to activate each arcade machine.

Don't worry, you can get free coins from the A.T.M.

How to play

W key: Move forward

A key: Move backwards

S key: Slide left

D key: Slide right

Move mouse: Look around

E key: Perform action

ESC key: Pause

Many thanks to: Jordi Casanova (music) and Aarón Ávila (arcade machine corrections) for their invaluable and unconditional support.
